solution_line_template: The total number of panels required is {total_homes}*{panels_per_home} = <<{total_homes}*{panels_per_home}={total_panels_required}>>{total_panels_required} panels.

When {panels_less_delivered} failed to be delivered, the total number available for use became {total_panels_required}-{panels_less_delivered} = <<{total_panels_required}-{panels_less_delivered}={panels_available}>>{panels_available} panels.

If each home requires {panels_per_home} panels, the number of homes that had panels installed is {panels_available}/{panels_per_home} = <<{panels_available}/{panels_per_home}={homes_installed}>>{homes_installed} homes
